TEXT.TITLE: BENGUET CORP <BE> CALENDAR 1986
TEXT.BODY: Net income 154.7 mln pesos vs 127.5 mln Operating revenues 4.42 billion vs 3.3 billion Operating profit 621.2 mln vs 203.4 mln Earnings per share 4.80 vs 3.95 NOTE: Company statement said gold operations contributed 74 pct of consolidated earnings. Reuter
